content: Is issue #76193 a bug with rustc? If not, I'm going to close it and direct the user to stack overflow or the users forum, but I want to make sure it's not a bug first.
Usage error, the stack pointer is moved when leaving the llvm_asm block. That's UB, I believe.
As I understand it, the assembly "call" makes a new stack frame, but never removes that stack frame before exiting the assembly block, so the returning rust function will do something wrong.
Okay, thanks! Will repost your comments and direct them to the forums if they need more help
